dec:inferencemodel.name: J48 Inference Model
dec:inferencemodel.description: Inference Model which uses a J48 classifier.

property.name: Training set size
property.description: This property indicates the ratio the trainings set will be divides for the actual training and for successive the test.

property.name: Crossvalidation Folds
property.description: This property indicates the amoung of folds for the crossvalidation evaluation

property.name: use unpruned tree
property.description: Specifies to use an unpruned tree

property.name: Minumum Instances
property.description: Specifies the minimum number of instances per leaf. (Default: 2)

property.name: Reduced error pruning
property.description: Specifies to use reduced error pruning. No subtree raising is performed

property.name: Number of folds
property.description: Specifies the number of folds for reduced error pruning. One fold is used as the pruning set. (Default: 3)

property.name: Use binary splits
property.description: Specifies to Use binary splits for nominal attributes.

property.name: Don't raise subtree
property.description: Specifies to not to perform subtree raising

property.name: Don't clean up
property.description: Specifies not not clean up after the tree has been built. -A If set, Laplace smoothing is used for predicted probabilites.

property.name: Seed
property.description: Specifies the seed for reduced-error pruning
